bag-type.query: SELECT DISTINCT a1_.id as a3_, a2_.identifier as a4_ FROM org.intermine.model.bio.BioEntity AS a1_, org.intermine.model.bio.CrossReference AS a2_ WHERE (a1_.crossReferences CONTAINS a2_ AND lower(a2_.identifier) in ?)
SELECT DISTINCT a1_.id as a3_, a2_.value as a4_ FROM org.intermine.model.bio.BioEntity AS a1_, org.intermine.model.bio.Synonym AS a2_ WHERE (a1_.synonyms CONTAINS a2_ AND lower(a2_.value) in ?)
